title: Impact and Response Strategies for Cyberbullying in Online Discussion Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online communication and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: A course for office/administrative working learners exploring the psychological impacts of cyberbullying and coping strategies when using online discussion boards.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more types of cyberbullying in an online discussion forum.
Learners analyze cases of the chilling effect caused by cyberbullying and propose response strategies.
Learners can engage in discussions by applying constructive feedback techniques instead of conflict avoidance during online discussions.

resources: Online discussion board platform (Zoom Breakout Rooms/Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
